name: Yuri Melnikov
canonicalFacts: Was a 62-year-old retired architect and a Russian immigrant.
Had no known health issues and was a regular at the bakery.
Collapsed shortly after exhibiting a terrified expression.

timeline.chapterTitle: Chapter Two: Something in the Air
timeline.status: Yuri is one of the victims of the unexplained deaths, described as having suddenly collapsed in Tartine Bakery.
